Class House

java.lang.Object
House
public class House
extends java.lang.Object
class house, holds the house rooms, name and smartobjects by extension

2020-09-30

    • blockWindow

      public void blockWindow​(java.lang.String name, boolean blocked)
      (Un)Blocks a window with an arbitrary object.
      Parameters:
      name - String name of the window to be (un)blocked.
      blocked - boolean true if window must be blocked, false if it must be unblocked.

    • LockAllDoors

      public void LockAllDoors()
      Locks all doors in the house by calling the method of the same name in all rooms

    • unlockAllDoors

      public void unlockAllDoors()
      unlocks all door in the house by calling the method of the same name in each room

    • openCloseObject

      public boolean openCloseObject​(java.lang.String name, boolean open)
      Searches all the rooms for the specified object and opens/closes it.
      Parameters:
      name - String name of the object to be opened/closed.
      open - boolean true if object should be opened, false if it should be closed.
      Returns:
      boolean true if the object was successfully opened/closed, false otherwise.
